EmailTemplate.subject: Moving Your Store Online? Read These 4 Best Practices
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The global grocery market will reach $334 billion by 2022. And if you’ve ever bought anything online, you know this channel is vastly safer, convenient and preferred to shopping in-person. Don’t drive your customers away because they can’t checkout online. There’s no better time to start your grocery digital transformation. And we’ve got the four best practices to get you up and running.
